AI Description: OpenSceneGraph (OSG) is an open-source high-performance 3D graphics toolkit that is widely used in the fields of virtual reality, simulation, visualization, and gaming. It provides a powerful scene graph API for rapid development of interactive 3D graphics applications.
Core Features: Cross-Platform Support For Windows, Macos, & Linux, Support For Shaders, Textures, Lighting, & Effects, Integration With Other Libraries Like Opengl, Openal, & Qt, Various File Format Support Including Obj, Osg, Fbx, & Collada, Extensive Documentation & Community Support
General Tags: 3D Graphics, Virtual Reality, Simulation, Visualization, Gaming
